name: Black ice Breast %26 Back Plate
description: This beautiful set is a symbol of hope and glory and should be respected as such. A beautiful raised pattern on the breast plate and back plate is further enhanced by patches of black. Combine this set with any pauldron that can be easily fixed to the breast plate using the d-rings on the shoulders.

name: Viking Armor, Dark Steel
description: Made from blackened layers of mild steel plates and connected with durable leather cording, this impressive Viking lamellar armor is flexible and rich in detail. The solid leather back plate makes this larp armor a must at any Larp event. Let the blood raid begin!

name: Milanese Armor
description: The Milanese Larp armor is a combination back and breast plate that fits well with faults and tassets. This Larp breastplate has a historical look but was designed for re-enactment. This metal cuirass allows for easy movement and will protect you well at your next role play event.

name: Milanese Armor, Dark
description: The Epic Dark Milanese Larp armor is a combination back and breast plate that fits well with faults and tassets. This Larp breastplate has a historical look but was designed for re-enactment. This metal cuirass allows for easy movement and will protect you well at your next role play event.

name: Warrior Breastplate, Dark
description: The Dark Warrior breastplate is a great piece of body armor that can be worn by any larp warrior.  The breast armor can be worn in diverse combat situations either worn alone or accompanied by shoulder armor. Forged for combat, become the best dark knight on the battlefield.

name: Churburg Armor
description: The Churburg Larp armor is a flexible form fitting breastplate covering the vital parts of the chest. The chest is covered in a series of plates that wrap around the warrior protecting his lower back.  Form fitting this larp breastplate is very comfortable and economical.

name: Churburg Armor, Dark
description: Made with a series of plates the Dark Churburg Armor gives the larper protection around the vulnerable parts of the chest without sacrificing movement. This larp armor wraps around the wearer giving it a snug fit. A form fitted armor allows the wearer to make exaggerated moves safely.

name: Warrior Breastplate
description: The basic Larp Warrior Breastplate consists of a shiny metal torso with large leather straps and adorned with steel rivets.  Excellent for any pikeman this breastplate can be worn in a variety of combat situations require full frontal protection and where a backplate is not necessary.  Two loops are fixed to the top ready to accommodate any Larp pauldrons.

name: Merc Light Armor
description: The Merc Light Armor is a perfect small breastplate for the nimble warrior. Any rogue will confirm that light armor is the best way to provide protection while giving you enough dexterity and speed when you need to flee.

name: Viking Armor, Steel
description: This adjustable Viking Larp armor is inspired by the traditional lamellar armor worn by the ancient fighters. Made from layers of polished 1mm steel plates and bound with leather cording it gives you the freedom and flexibility needed in combat. Join the bretheren!

name: RFB Breastplate
description: The RFB Breastplate is made from polished steel and made for the novice warrior. The Ready for Battle Breastplate is made from mild steel and is a useful piece for the price conscious warrior embarking on his first adventure. Made in a variety of sizes it will fit almost any Larp fighter but must be worn alone and without pauldrons.

name: RFB Breastplate, Dark
description: Forged in our medieval armory, this darkened steel RFB Breastplate was made for any would be warrior. Made from mild steel, the ready for battle breastplate is great for any novice warrior starting out on his first mission. Available in several sizes this dark torso armor was made to be worn alone and without pauldrons.

name: Ratio Torso Scale Mail Armor
description: The Ratio Torso armor is basically a blackened steel scale mail with a leather backing and beautiful leather trim work. Considered to be the most comfortable and well protected armor to wear in battle, this black scale mail armor is very adjustable and can be worn on top of a gambeson for added comfort.

name: Merc Breast and Back Armor, Black
description: The metal breastplate and leather back plate from the Mercenary Armor remains the most versatile and unrestricted Larp armor that we have to date. The rolled edges protect not only the wearer but the weapons of your opponent as well. This Larp armor can adjust to fit most anyone and is extremely light to wear.

name: Undead Breast %26 Back Plate
description: Blackened by the blood of many fallen warriors, this set of Breast and Back plates are impressive and unique. A raised beaded pattern creates an intense gothic look and can be found on the breast plate as well as the back plate. All the straps are includes and a set of pauldrons can easily be fitted to further enhance this set.

name: Merc Armor Breast and Back, Brown
description: Le plastron en métal et le dos en cuir de l'Armure du Mercenaire reste l'armure la plus polyvalente et sans restriction que nous avons à ce jour. Les bords roulés protègent l'utilisateur et aussi les armes de vos adversaires. Cette armure peut s'ajuster à presque toutes les tailles et est extrêmement légère à porter.

name: Gothic Half Armor
description: Our Gothic Larp Armor resembles those worn during historic medieval battles. Forged by hand this epic fantasy armor was created with Larping in mind. This set comes complete with breastplate and backplate armor.  It is the ideal protection for the experienced gothic warrior.

name: Dark Drake Breastplate
description: The Dark Drake breastplate was forged here in our armory and made as frontal armor for Larp combat. Decorated with a series of raised lines this Larp breastplate can be combined with our backplate or shoulder armor or worn alone giving you a distinct style. Enter safely into combat knowing that we offer only the best Larp armor for your epic adventures.

name: King Breastplate
description: The King Larp breastplate consists of a polished metal torso with a large raised cross in an acid grey finish. This breastplate grants full frontal protection when a backplate is not necessary and can be combined with our shoulder armor. Made in our armory this is an efficient and handsome torso armor that fits well with any medieval costume.
